headline: Coinbase Faces Gambling Probe As Cybersecurity Push And ARK Moves Shape Outlook
summary: Coinbase Global (NasdaqGS:COIN) is facing legal action from the Nevada Gaming Control Board over alleged unlicensed gambling offerings. The company has expanded its work with Crypto ISAC to broaden cyber threat intelligence sharing across the crypto sector. Cathie Wood’s ARK Invest has reduced its Coinbase position, while still keeping the stock among its top 10 holdings. For you as an investor, these developments touch several key angles at once: regulation, security, and institutional...

headline: Assessing Coinbase Global (COIN) After Sharp Share Price Swings And Crypto Sentiment Shifts
summary: If you are wondering whether Coinbase Global's share price still lines up with its underlying value, this breakdown is designed to help you make sense of what you are paying for. The stock last closed at US$141.09, with returns of a 3.4% decline over 7 days, a 44.2% decline over 30 days, a 40.4% decline year to date, a 52.7% decline over 1 year and a 115.1% return over 3 years, which hints at shifting views on both its growth potential and risk profile. headline: Bitcoin Falls Again. How Low It Could Go Before Rallying.
summary: Bitcoin was falling again early Friday, having failed to maintain a sustained bounce from last week’s steep drop.  Elsewhere, the crypto exchange  Coinbase  was up 6.5% in premarket trading, despite releasing disappointing fourth-quarter results Thursday.  Geoff Kendrick, head of digital assets research at Standard Chartered, recently lowered his Bitcoin price forecast for this year from $150,000 to $100,000.

content.title: Bitcoin Falls Again. How Low It Could Go Before Rallying.
content.summary: Bitcoin was falling again early Friday, having failed to maintain a sustained bounce from last week’s steep drop. Geoff Kendrick, head of digital assets research at Standard Chartered, recently lowered his Bitcoin price forecast for this year from $150,000 to $100,000.

headline: A Winter for Stablecoins Would Signal Crypto Deep Freeze
summary: Stablecoins aren’t designed for speculation.  The total market value of the seven largest U.S. dollar stablecoins currently tracked by CoinGecko has declined almost 2% from its peak in December.  At  Coinbase Global  bitcoin is responsible for the largest share of transaction revenue of any particular token or coin.

headline: COIN Q4 Deep Dive: Revenue Diversification and Product Expansion Amid Crypto Market Headwinds
summary: Blockchain infrastructure company Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales falling 21.6% year on year to $1.78 billion. Its non-GAAP loss of $2.49 per share was significantly below analysts’ consensus estimates.
